metadata.title: CVE-2019-14939 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the mysql (aka mysqljs) module 2.17.1 forNode.js. The LOAD DATA LOCAL INFILE option is open by default.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-14939` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-mysql - 2.18.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-mysql package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.18.1-1').
